definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be sick, only in der. species (As. II. marâṣu Dl:HWB 426; Ar. marid.a; Sab. [[מרץַ]] sick person, sickness, Mordt:ZMG 1876, 32; Aram. vb. mra9, [[מְרַע]]);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נִמְרְחוּ]] Job 6:25 (but v. infr.); Pt. [[נִמְרָץ]] Mic 2:10; f. [[נִמְרֶ֫חֶת]] 1Ki 2:8; —[[חֶבֶל נִמְרָץ]] Mic 2:10 a sore, grievous destruction (lit. made sick, cf. [[מַכָּה נַחְלָה]] Je 14:17); [[נִמְרֶחֶת קְלָלָה]] 1Ki 2:8 a grievous curse.—In Job 6:25 this mng. unsuit., Bu are strong, effective [cf. As. I. marâṣu, be difficult, inaccessible Dl:HWB 425 f.; always of something repelling]. More prob. [[נמרחו]] = [[נמלחו]] be sweet (cf. Ps 119:103) or rd. [[נמלחו]] (q. v.), Che:JQ July, 1897 Du.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. sf. [[מַה־יַּמְרִיחְְ]] Job 16:3 what sickens thee (what disturbs, vexes thee) that thou answerest ?
